name: C-weather-assignment
tagline: Open Weather Map API C# program
body:
Welcome to Daniel & Nadav's Open Weather project.

The program was written as a final project at programming-languages course.

How to use the API:
You can set a new Location object and set it's city attribute to any city you like.
Initiate a WeatherDataServiceFactory instance and then send to it's GetWeatherDataService method the Location object.
The API returns a parsed Json object and you can choose what output you want to print.

Example:
 WeatherDataServiceFactory obj = WeatherDataServiceFactory.Instance;                    

            Location location = new Location();                                                    
            location.city = "London";

            var tmp = obj.GetWeatherDataService(location);
            System.Console.WriteLine("Country: " + tmp.Sys.Country.ToString() + "\nCity: " + tmp.Name.ToString() + "\nTempreture: " + tmp.Main.Temp.ToString() + " (Kelvin)" + "\nWind Speed: " + tmp.Wind.Speed.ToString() + "\nPressure: " + tmp.Main.Pressure.ToString() + " (Kelvin)" + "\nHumidity: " + tmp.Main.Humidity.ToString());
            

Enjoy.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
